chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface

Goal:
forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (h' : fin N) (pli plt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleRequestVote h st t h' pli plt = (st', m) -> currentTerm st <= currentTerm st'

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
handleRequestVote = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (_ : name) (state : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (candidateId : fin N) (lastLogIndex lastLogTerm : nat) => if t <? currentTerm state then (state, RequestVoteReply (currentTerm state) false) else let state0 := advanceCurrentTerm state t in if (if leaderId state0 then false else true) && moreUpToDate lastLogTerm lastLogIndex (maxTerm (log state0)) (maxIndex (log state
term = nat : Set
N = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (RaftParams0 : RaftParams orig_base_params) => let (N, _, _, clientId, _) := RaftParams0 in N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> nat Arguments N {orig_base_params RaftParams}
raft_data = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments raft_data {orig_base_params raft_params}
Notation currentTerm := (RaftState.currentTerm term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
clientId = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (RaftParams0 : RaftParams orig_base_params) => let (_, _, _, clientId, _) := RaftParams0 in clientId : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments clientId {orig_base_params RaftParams}
logIndex = nat : Set
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
Inductive serverType : Set := Follower : serverType | Candidate : serverType | Leader : serverType
Inductive msg (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := RequestVote : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> msg | RequestVoteReply : term -> bool -> msg | AppendEntries : term -> name -> logIndex -> term -> list entry -> logIndex -> msg | AppendEntriesReply : term -> list entry -> bool -> msg Arguments msg {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVote {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments RequestVoteReply {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%bool_scope Arguments AppendEntries {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _ _ _%list_scope Arguments AppendEntries
fin = fix fin (n : nat) : Type := match n with | 0 => False | S n' => option (fin n') end : nat -> Type Arguments fin _%nat_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
data = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (data, _, _) := BaseParams0 in data : BaseParams -> Type Arguments data {BaseParams}
Module RaftState := Struct Record raft_data (term name entry logIndex serverType stateMachineData clientId output : Type) : Type := mkRaft_data { currentTerm : term; votedFor : option name; leaderId : option name; log : list entry; commitIndex : logIndex; lastApplied : logIndex; stateMachine : stateMachineData; nextIndex : list (name * logIndex); matchIndex : list (name * logIndex); shouldSend : bool; votesReceived : list name; type : serverType; clientCache : list (clientId * (nat * output)); electoralVictories : list (term * list name * list entry) }
*** [ Core.ByteListReader.t : Type -> Type ] Arguments Core.ByteListReader.t _%type_scope
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
handleAppendEntries_spec : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> currentTerm st <= currentTerm st'
handleAppendEntriesReply_spec : forall (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h' : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (r : bool) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply h st h' t es r = (st', ms) -> currentTerm st <= currentTerm st'
handleRequestVote_same_log : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (ms : msg), handleRequestVote n st t c li lt = (st', ms) -> log st' = log st
handleRequestVote_same_commitIndex : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (ms : msg), handleRequestVote n st t c li lt = (st', ms) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st
handleRequestVote_same_lastApplied : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat) (c : fin N) (li lt : nat) (st' : raft_data) (ms : msg), handleRequestVote n st t c li lt = (st', ms) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
handleAppendEntries_same_lastApplied : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
handleAppendEntriesReply_same_commitIndex : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (b : bool) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply n st src t es b = (st', l) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st
handleAppendEntriesReply_same_lastApplied : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (b : bool) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply n st src t es b = (st', l) -> lastApplied st' = lastApplied st
handleAppendEntriesReply_same_log : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (b : bool) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleAppendEntriesReply n st src t es b = (st', l) -> log st' = log st
handleTimeout_spec : forall (h : name) (st : electionsData * raft_data) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (t : term) (h' : name), handleTimeout h (snd st) = (out, st', l) -> In h' (cronies (update_elections_data_timeout h st) t) -> currentTerm (snd st) <= currentTerm st' /\ (In h' (cronies (fst st) t) \/ t = currentTerm st')
handleRequestVoteReply_same_log : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (v : bool), log (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v) = log st
handleRequestVoteReply_same_commitIndex : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (v : bool), commitIndex (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v) = commitIndex st
handleRequestVoteReply_same_lastApplied : forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (v : bool), lastApplied (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v) = lastApplied st
handleClientRequest_spec : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', l) -> currentTerm st' = currentTerm st
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> gd = update_elections_data_appendEntries (pDst p)...
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> gd = update_elections_data_appendEntries (pDst...
doLeader_spec : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> currentTerm st' = currentTerm st
doGenericServer_spec : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doGenericServer h st = (os, st', ms) -> currentTerm st' = currentTerm st
raft_net_invariant_append_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_append_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
applied_entries_update : forall (sigma : name -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output), lastApplied st >= lastApplied (sigma h) -> applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st) = applied_entries sigma /\ (exists h' : name, argmax (fun h0 : name => lastApplied (sigma h0)) (all_fin N) = Some h' /\ lastApplied (sigma h') >= lastApplied st) \/ argmax (fun h' : name => lastApplied (update name_eq_dec sigma h st h')) (all_fin N) = Some h /\ applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st) = rev (removeAfterIndex (log st) (lastApplied st))
cronies_term = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : name) (h' : Net.name) (t : term), In h (cronies (fst (nwState net h')) t) -> t <= currentTerm (snd (nwState net h')) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments cronies_term {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
update_elections_data_requestVote = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me _ : name) (t : nat) (candidateId : fin N) (lastLogIndex lastLogTerm : nat) (st : electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) => let (st', _) := handleRequestVote me (snd st) t candidateId lastLogIndex lastLogTerm in let (o, o0) := (votedFor (snd st), votedFor st') in match o with | Some cid => match o0 with | Some cid' => if (currentTerm (snd st) =? currentTerm st') && (if name_eq_dec cid cid' then true else false) then fst st else {| votes := (currentTerm st', cid') :: votes (...
applied_entries_log_lastApplied_update_same : forall (sigma : name -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output), log st = log (sigma h) -> lastApplied st = lastApplied (sigma h) -> applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st) = applied_entries sigma
advanceCurrentTerm_same_lastApplied : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat), lastApplied (advanceCurrentTerm st t) = lastApplied st
advanceCurrentTerm_same_log : forall (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (t : nat), log (advanceCurrentTerm st t) = log st
applyEntries_spec : forall (es : list entry) (h : name) (st : raft_data) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data), applyEntries h st es = (os, st') -> exists (d : data) (cc : list (clientId * (nat * output))), st' = RaftState.set_raft_data_clientCache term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_stateMachine term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output st d) cc
update_elections_data_net = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (me src : name) (m : msg) (st : electionsData * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) => match m with | RequestVote t _ lastLogIndex lastLogTerm => update_elections_data_requestVote me src t src lastLogIndex lastLogTerm st | RequestVoteReply t voteGranted => update_elections_data_requestVoteReply me src t voteGranted st | AppendEntries t lid prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit => update_elections_data_appendEntries me st t lid prevLogIndex prevLogTerm entries leaderCommit | AppendEntriesReply _ _ _ => fst st end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), name -> name -> msg...
applied_entries_safe_update : forall (sigma : name -> RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output), lastApplied st = lastApplied (sigma h) -> removeAfterIndex (log st) (lastApplied (sigma h)) = removeAfterIndex (log (sigma h)) (lastApplied (sigma h)) -> applied_entries (update name_eq_dec sigma h st) = applied_entries sigma
advanceCurrentTerm = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (state : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (newTerm : nat) => if currentTerm state <? newTerm then RaftState.set_raft_data_leaderId term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_type term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_votedFor term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output (RaftState.set_raft_data_currentTerm term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output state newTerm) None) Follower) None else state : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data...
cacheApplyEntry = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (e : entry) => match getLastId st (eClient e) with | Some (id, o) => if eId e <? id then ([], st) else if eId e =? id then ([o], st) else applyEntry st e | None => applyEntry st e end : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, OneNodeParams orig_base_params ->...-> list output * RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output Arguments cacheApplyEntry {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
